TABLE.NAME: local_servercron
TABLE.COMMENT: Table server Cron - saves cron entries so we can recreate cron file whenever required

FIELD.NAME: minute
FIELD.COMMENT: Store minutes 1-59 or -1 which means any minute default -1

FIELD.NAME: hour
FIELD.COMMENT: Saves the hour bit 0 - 23 and -1 is every hour default -1

FIELD.NAME: day
FIELD.COMMENT: day of the month (1 - 31) with -1 meaning every day - default -1

FIELD.NAME: month
FIELD.COMMENT: month (1 - 12) OR jan,feb,mar,apr ... -1 = every month and is the default

FIELD.NAME: wday
FIELD.COMMENT: day of week (0 - 6) (Sunday=0 or 7) OR sun,mon,tue,wed,thu,fri,sat default -1 every day

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: whether the cron job should be added to the cron file - stops the cron when required
